a.title: Horizon Science Academy Cleveland High School by Concept Schools
Horizon Science Academy Cleveland High School by Concept Schools

div.div: Horizon Science Academy Cleveland High School by Concept Schools

img.title: hsa-cleveland-high
img.div:
A culture that revolves around students, their families,
and the community to ensure involvement and student success.

img.title: hsas
img.div:
HSA offers hands-on science classes, science fairs, mathematics
competitions, robotics clubs, and engineering classes to
engage and interest students in our STEM-based curriculum.

div.class: vc_general vc_tta vc_tta-tabs vc_tta-color-blue vc_tta-style-flat vc_tta-shape-square vc_tta-o-shape-group vc_tta-o-no-fill vc_tta-tabs-position-top vc_tta-controls-align-center vc_custom_1456382906670 vc_tta-tabs_style-1

div.p: Thank you so much. I don’t know what I would have ever done with my boys without Horizon. I would tell anybody to send their children there. Horizon Science Academy is my second house, I feel as if am with my family. The teachers are not just teachers but friends as well. The students feel safe inside the building and confident about their learning.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1514572298975 vc_row-has-fill vc_video-bg-container

div.h2: Horizon Science Academy Cleveland High School

div.p: Parents can apply to HSA Cleveland High online for grades 9-12 here.

a.class: stm-btn stm-btn_outline stm-btn_white stm-btn_md stm-btn_icon-right stm-btn_color_white

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-7 vc_col-xs-12

p.span: Horizon Science Academy Cleveland High School is a public charter school serving ninth through twelfth grades managed by Concept Schools.
is a nonprofit charter management organization that provides a high-quality, STEM-focused and college-preparatory education through a network of
while offering exceptional programs, comprehensive services, and opportunities to partner in education.

the 2019-20 academic year.

wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-8 vc_col-xs-12

div.p: Thank you so much. I don’t know what I would have ever done with my boys without Horizon. I would tell anybody to send their children there.
I think Horizon Science Academy is a good school choice for my child because it has lots of nice and wonderful teachers. The teachers are well equipped in wanting success for their students.

I chose Horizon Science Academy for my child for a reason. Mainly to keep my child away from all the negativity and disorder that goes on in the Public school system. And I stand firmly behind my choice.

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs

div.span: Horizon Science Academy Cleveland High is managed by Concept Schools. Concept Schools is a nonprofit charter management organization that provides a high-quality, STEM-focused and college-preparatory education through a network of charter schools while offering exceptional programs, comprehensive services, and opportunities to partner in education.
